content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 13}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 9, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 27, "index": 21}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 57, "index": 26}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 19, "index": 39}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 11, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a writable_book, I need to place a book, an ink_sac, and a feather in the crafting table. I will start by moving the feather from slot 31 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: writable_book
inventory=[{"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 13}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 9, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 27, "index": 21}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 57, "index": 26}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 19, "index": 39}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 11, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I will move the book from slot 36 to slot 2, which is to the right of the feather in slot 1.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 13}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 9, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 41, "index": 20}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 27, "index": 21}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 57, "index": 26}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 50, "index": 32}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 19, "index": 39}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 11, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
